title: parser bug: block comments with newline inside parens
body:
by **arnehormann**: 
What is the expected output?

The following two programs should both be valid Go, the only difference between them is
the position of a block comment containing a newline inside parens.
http://play.golang.org/p/5q7fp_ZtZ3
http://play.golang.org/p/mWVGhYZAwc

What do you see instead?

The first compiles, the second fails with "syntax error: unexpected semicolon or
newline, expecting )".

Please provide any additional information below.

I read the spec concerning semicolon insertion, but it does not mention comments.
Even if the current parser behavior is valid, it is baffling and I did not find it
mentioned anywhere.
